version_description:
- Fingerprint authentication
- Request PIN replacement by SMS
- Manage your notifications (mark as read/delete)
- Download card statements as PDF/Excel
- View supplementary card statement
- Other bugfixes and updates

- Added compatability to iPhone X
- Added Entertainer module
- Added fingerprint authentication timeout
- Other bug fixes and updates

- Fixed notifications count
- Improved app's performance

- Brand new look and feel.
- Manage your child allowances with our latest iLead product.
